name: Data Infrastructure Engineer
description:
Viber is one of the most popular apps in the world, and the most downloaded app to have come out of the start-up nation. Working with Viber is a unique opportunity to influence the hundreds of millions of people using our messaging app.

Job description:

Responsibilities

  • Design, development and maintenance of Viber’s Big Data system, processing hundreds of thousands of events every second and accepting Billions of requests on a daily basis
  • Safeguard the quality of Viber services with a variety of automatic tests and test environments
  • Working with massive datasets, both structured and unstructured, using a variety of databases and technologies
  • Partner with product, business intelligence and engineering teams to solve problems and identify trends and opportunities
  • Inform, influence, support, and execute our product decisions and product launches

Requirements

  • 4 years of experience with server-side and/or data development
  • Experience developing Big Data systems with Java
  • Experience developing services on Node
  • Solid understanding of the principles and advantaged behind functional programming
  • Experience working with Docker containers
  • Experience working with AWS technologies (e.g.: SQS, Kinesis, DynamoDB, S3, CloudWatch, Athena)
  • A strong Self-learner
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • BSc. in Computer Science or equivalent

Advantages

  • Background in developing with real-time big data computation frameworks - Storm, Spark
  • Background in asynchronous programming and functional programming in Java (e.g. RxJava)
  • Experience working with Couchbase
  • Experience with the Hadoop ecosystem (HBase, MapReduce, Hive/Pig)
  • Good knowledge of additional languages or data science tools (e.g. numpy, pandas, R)
Conditions:
  • Work in worldwide famous product
  • Friendly and professional team
  • Challenging tasks
  • Competitive salary
  • Incentive program
  • Medical insurance

  • Sport expenses compensation

  • 4 sick leave days without medical certificate

  • Present on your Birthday

  • Democratic management
